Emotion: Every interaction should lower the user's heart rate.
Content: Data is the hero. Use 'Control Room' density for dashboards.
Contrast: High contrast text for accessibility (WCAG AA/AAA).

marketing.description: Asymmetrical, overlapping, artistic. Use col-span-full for hero, col-span-4 for features.

dashboard.description: Dense, data-heavy. Use col-span-1 for metrics, col-span-2/3 for charts.

images.description: Doctor consulting patient, warm lighting, trust-building.
Abstract minimalist medical tech, clean blue/white.
Women doing yoga outdoors, nature, health.

customization_rules: Shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for floating elements.

specific_components.buttons: h-10 px-6 font-medium tracking-wide transition-all hover:scale-[1.02] active:scale-[0.98]
specific_components.cards: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
specific_components.charts: Use Recharts via Shadcn Charts. Colors: chart-1 (Forest), chart-2 (Sage), chart-3 (Clay).

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
DO NOT use gradients for text unless it's the AI brand name.
DO NOT center text by default. Left align for readability.
Add micro-interactions (hover, focus, active) to EVERYTHING.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-trust, calming healthcare portal. Follow the 'Organic & Earthy' theme. Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard to handle data density without clutter. Prioritize the 'Manrope' font for all headings to give it a modern, human feel. Use Shadcn components but override the styling to match the 'Soft Utility' aesthetic defined in the colors section.
